title: Pixel 4a promised a replacement never received on 04 mnth now. nobody responds to call also
content:
Worst services by google.
Pixel 4a had issue from begging Google customer service advised to try troubleshooting.
Nothing happened.
Finally after 150+ mails 70+ calls they agreed for replacement.
Case still pending 04 mth now.
Nothing happened and worst nobody picks up the call in CUSTOMER SERVICE centre ( actually call back request)
